eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.util

Class ShallowParsingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.util.ShallowParsingUtils

  • public class ShallowParsingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods used for dealing with ShallowEntitys.

      • containsLoopReferenceWithoutLoop

        public static boolean containsLoopReferenceWithoutLoop(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> block)
        Checks if continue or break are contained in a for or while loop in the given block. If there is continue, break or return; in a code segment, it can not be extracted. (Note: return sth; may be extractable.)
        Parameters:
        block - the ShallowEntities that will be checked.
        Returns:
        true if there is continue or break

      • getCompleteStatement

        public static java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getCompleteStatement(ShallowEntity shallowEntity)
        Returns for a given entity that contains an if or try block a list of ShallowEntities that represents the corresponding else if or catch and else or finally block. That means that the complete statement is determined and returned.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntity - the entity that contains an if or try block
        Returns:
        The list of ShallowEntities that contains the corresponding block with all else if or catch and else or finally entities belonging to the given shallowEntity

      • getFirstEntityAfter

        public static ShallowEntity getFirstEntityAfter(ShallowEntity candidate)
        Returns the entity which is directly after the given ShallowEntity.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the last entity of the candidate
        Returns:
        The first entity which begins after the the given ShallowEntity. If there is no such entity, null will be returned.

      • getLastEntityBefore

        public static ShallowEntity getLastEntityBefore(ShallowEntity candidate)
        Returns the entity which is directly before the given ShallowEntity.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the first entity of the candidate
        Returns:
        The last entity which ends before the the given ShallowEntity. If there is no such entity, null will be returned.

      • getNestingArea

        public static int getNestingArea(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities)
        Returns the nesting area of a list of ShallowEntities. The nesting area is the sum of the nesting depth of all ShallowEntities.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities.
        Returns:
        The nesting area of the given entities.

      • getNestingDepth

        public static int getNestingDepth(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> block)
        Returns the maximal nesting depth of the given block.
        Parameters:
        block - the ShallowEntities that are taken into account for the maximal nesting depth.
        Returns:
        The maximal nesting depth

      • getNestingDepth

        public static int getNestingDepth(ShallowEntity shallowEntity)
        Returns the maximal nesting depth of the given entity.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntity - the ShallowEntity.
        Returns:
        The maximal nesting depth

      • getNumberOfBlankLinesOrCommentsAfter

        public static int getNumberOfBlankLinesOrCommentsAfter(ShallowEntity candidate)
        Returns the number of blank or commented lines after the given ShallowEntity.
        Parameters:
        candidate - if a refactoring candidate should be considered, take its last ShallowEntity.
        Returns:
        The number of blank or commented lines

      • getNumberOfBlankLinesOrCommentsBefore

        public static int getNumberOfBlankLinesOrCommentsBefore(ShallowEntity candidate)
        Returns the number of blank or commented lines before the given ShallowEntity.
        Parameters:
        candidate - if a refactoring candidate should be considered, take its first ShallowEntity.
        Returns:
        The number of blank or commented lines

      • getReturnParameters

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReturnParameters(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> block)
        Returns a list of variable names (identifiers) that must be returned from the specified block if it is extracted into a new method
        Parameters:
        block - ShallowEntities that might be extracted
        Returns:
        List of identifiers

      • getStatements

        public static java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getStatements(ShallowEntity entity)
        Returns all statements in the given entity

      • getClassEntities

        public static java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getClassEntities(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities,
                                                             int startLine,
                                                             int endLine)
        Obtain all classes (including anonymous classes) that contain directly or indirectly the method corresponding to the given line numbers.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities that represent the file in which the finding was found
        startLine - the start line of the code area that must be covered by the classes
        endLine - the end line of the code area that must be covered by the classes
        Returns:
        A list that contains at least one ShallowEntity with type TYPE.

      • getMethods

        public static java.util.List<ShallowEntity> getMethods(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities)
        Obtain all methods.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities that represent the file in which the finding was found
        Returns:
        all entities of type EShallowEntityType.METHOD

      • getMethod

        public static java.util.Optional<ShallowEntity> getMethod(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities,
                                                          OffsetBasedRegion region)
        Get a method by its region. The region must match exactly.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities that represent the file in which the finding was found
        region - of the method

      • getMethod

        public static java.util.Optional<ShallowEntity> getMethod(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities,
                                                          LineBasedRegion region)
        Get a method by its region. The region must match exactly.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities that represent the file in which the finding was found
        region - of the method

      • getMethod

        public static java.util.Optional<ShallowEntity> getMethod(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> shallowEntities,
                                                          java.util.function.Predicate<ShallowEntity> filter)
        Get a method using a predicate.
        Parameters:
        shallowEntities - the ShallowEntities that represent the file in which the finding was found
        filter - to filter a method

      • getClassAttributes

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassAttributes(java.util.List<ShallowEntity> classEntities)
        Extracts from a given token (that represents a file) all the attributes (variables) that are declared directly in a type (class) and not within a method etc.
        Parameters:
        classEntities - the ShallowEntity of the class that contains the method for which suggestions are to be generated
        Returns:
        A list containing all the names (identifiers) of the global variables

      • isLoop

        public static boolean isLoop(ShallowEntity entity)
        Checks if the entity is a loop (for, foreach, while).

      • isSubpartOfBranchingStatement

        public static boolean isSubpartOfBranchingStatement(ShallowEntity entity)
        Checks if the given entity is part of a branching statement but not the first option of the branches. Those statements must not be separated from the first part of the branching statement when we consider refactoring suggestions.
        Returns:
        For entities of subtype ELSE IF, ELSE, CATCH, FINALLY, CASE, DEFAULT, USING, DO will return true but for other subtypes (including IF, SWITCH, TRY) return false.

      • isCppConstructor

        public static boolean isCppConstructor(ELanguage language,
                                       ShallowEntity entity)
        Checks whether the given method is a C++ constructor.

      • isLambdaMethod

        public static boolean isLambdaMethod(ShallowEntity entity)
        Returns:
        whether the given entity is a lambda method.

      • getLanguage

        public static ELanguage getLanguage(ShallowEntity entity)
        Determines the language of the given entity or null if it cannot be determined
